A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I knew this movie would be polarizing....and as a lifelong Star Wars\, while I understand why people are upset\, I personally enjoyed it greatly and think it’s my favorite thus far. It’s not the same Star Wars anymore for sure\, but it’s still Star Wars. Maybe the reviews\, like the film and the SW world itself\, requires balance from the “light” and “dark”.
